availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James Taulbee and Elizabeth Taulbee. Married to Hannah Burton Taulbee in Owsley County, Kentucky, on October 16, 1852. Father of Matilda Taulbee, Andrew Taulbee, Perlina Taulbee, William G. Taulbee, and Louisa Taulbee. Laborer in Owsley County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Breathitt County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, p. 291A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 319.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, Precinct 3, p. 363A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994052, Owsley County Marriages, p. 1.
"James W Taulbee (1827-1910)," Find A Grave, Memorial 93386826, accessed January 26, 2024, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/93386826.
